name: VoxPopMe
overview:
VoxPopMe provides a brands and agencies an exciting way of soliciting consumer opinion through video responses to questions they ask.

VoxPopMe is a disruptive technology that can help shape the future of a brand or agencies products, services and ultimately the brand by enabling them to quickly and efficiently canvas the opinion of thousands of consumers in their target market. Brands will gain both qualitative and quantitative feedback. VoxPopMe founder, Dave Carruthers, realised there was a large gap in the market and that utilising smartphone technology could change the way brands solicit consumer opinion making it cost-effective, fast, reliable and incredibly targeted. Say goodbye to costly and time-consuming market research, say hello to VoxPopMe.

As a new VoxPopMe user you can sign up quickly and easily through your Facebook account, and get started straightaway by scrolling through forethought questions from leading brands. You can then respond to questions by recording and uploading a short video straight from your smartphone, after which you are rewarded for your responses and receive cash for your answers. This is deposited straight into your VoxPopMe account, and as soon as you reach £25 you can collect your earnings through the app’s cash-out facility integrated with trusted brand PayPal.

To date, VoxPopMe has had confirmation from a number of leading brands such as RAC, Papa Johns Pizza and National Express.
